attributes.action: All Key Workers to recieve a 3 month income tax break.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is only fair, they do not have the option to hide at home to keep themselves and their family safe.
attributes.background: The government have quite rightly so stepped up to support those out of work due to the coronavirus. However our key workers, who are vital to keeping the country running are putting themselves at increased risk everyday some of them are working crazy hours to cover sickness, where is their reward.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
